resources.string: Seraphina bounds in with bubbling enthusiasm, her pockets filled with vials and pouches of mysterious ingredients, her eyes sparkling with the anticipation of alchemical discoveries. A concoction of your own creation, perhaps? Surprise me with your most exotic potion-like beverage. Today\'s experiments were... let\'s say, eventful. I need a drink that defies expectations.

string-array.name: player_seraphina
string-array.item: An eventful day of experiments calls for a drink that defies the ordinary. May it surprise and delight.
Experiments, huh? Just don\'t turn yourself into a new potion with that drink.
Your mastery of surprises is captivating. Maybe a drink and a few more surprises would make for an interesting night?
